Container.Name: KitchenCupboard
Container.Overview: Kitchen Cupboard is a collaborative, self-hosted shopping list app. Features include real-time multi-user collaboration via WebSocket, smart auto-categorization, recipe import from popular cooking sites, offline PWA support, and a clean mobile-first UI. Perfect for families and households who want a private, shared shopping list without relying on cloud services.

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: Path to store the SQLite database and application data.

Config.Name: Secret Key
Config.Description: REQUIRED: A long random string used for JWT signing. Generate with: python -c 'import secrets; print(secrets.token_urlsafe(64))'. The app will not start without this.

Config.Name: Registration Enabled
Config.Description: Set to 'true' to allow open registration. Default is 'false' (invite-only mode). Enable temporarily for initial setup, then disable.
